page.title: 11ACTIVITIES (ROLLESBY)
page.content: Clubs and activities occur in the village hall.There is a Playgroup on Mondays,Wednesdays and Fridays it is at 9:30 am. The Happy Rollers Club for the over 60's meets every 4th Tuesday at 2:00pm,at 7:45pm there is Bingo. Youth club is at 7:00pm for the over 10's.Thursday there is solo whist at 7:30pm.Keep Fit is at 8:00pm.The Playing field is used for sports like Football and Tennis.The Pavillion is for small clubs but is used for childrens parties also.The uniformed organisations held in Rollesby are Brownies and Guides.Another organisation is F.O.R.C,who are responsible for organising charity funds to keep the Church in good condition.The mens Royal British Legion is held in the "Horse and Groom".
